title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Finance) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department finance) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Andrew Smith, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Andrew Smith, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Finance, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Robert Troy, Minister of State at the Department of Finance, with effect from 14 
April 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 July, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [363] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN,

D08 XAO6

r-phost: publications@opw.ie
